channel.title: CVE Feed for Tribulant -- Slideshow Gallery LITE

item.title: CVE-2023-28491|2024-08-02T12:38:25.446Z -- tribulant -- slideshow%20gallery%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Tribulant Slideshow Gallery LITE.This issue affects Slideshow Gallery LITE: from n/a through 1.7.6.
